thag5.7:1.3: I plunged into the water at Gayā
thag5.7:2.3: I’ll now rinse away right here”—
thag5.7:2.4: such was the view I used to hold.
thag5.7:4.1: I’ve washed away all bad things;
thag5.7:4.3: the pure heir of the pure one,
thag5.7:4.4: a true-born son of the Buddha.
thag5.7:5.1: When I plunged into the eightfold stream,
thag5.7:5.2: all bad things were rinsed away.
